name: Without Love
lyric:
Without love~ I have nothing
Without love~ I am nothing
Let me not hurt like this
Let me get through this

Tell me that I will be alright
Tell me I will live through this
Let me fall into an ocean of you
Let me no longer despair over you

Take my heart
Pretend that you're loving me
Tell me that you love me
Even if it's not so true
Tell all that you can't do
So I can get through
Knowing you don't love me
No way, no how, not now

I say~ just let go
Feelings~ overflow
Let me not hurt like this
Let me get through this

One more~ lonely night
Without~ any might
Let me fall into an ocean of you
Let me no longer despair over you
lyric_extra: 文本歌词最后由 sevenprince 编辑于2019-09-11 15:04

comments.brief: 今天晚安曲第二首是；顺子《Without Love》推荐理由；我在平时晚上听英文歌比较多顺子的这首歌我在最近晚上经常听 感觉不错 顺子的声音也是属于适合晚上听的好声音 晚安星空 晚安大家
最喜欢chorus部分...让我每次说no way都会想唱出来....no way! no how, not now!~  @JedZ
